column1: State-wise Decennial Population by Census in India
Note : * : Arunachal Pradesh was Censused for the First Time in 1961.
** : The 1981 Census Could Not be Held Owing to Disturbed Conditions Prevailing in Assam. Hence the Population Figures for 1981 of Assam.
+ : Uttaranchal, Jharkhand, Chhattisgarh States Carved Out from UP, Bihar and MP Respectively are Censused for the First Time in 2001.
*** : The 1991 Census was Not Held in Jammu and Kashmir. Hence the Population Figures for 1991 of Jammu and Kashmir have been Worked.
++ : The Population of Manipur State Includes the Estimated Population of Mao Maram, Paomata and Purul Sub-divisionssof Senapati District.
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  ^ : Figures are in Thousands.
Source : Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation, Govt. of India. (ON402) &
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â  Reserve Bank of India. (ON1197)
